strapiPost.title: Slim Chickens’ Makes Franchise Times Top 500 List
strapiPost.content:
Fayetteville-based Slim Chickens’ was recognized on the Franchise Times Top 500 list for the second year in a row, jumping more than 20 spots since last year’s ranking. 

  • Chicken trenders: In the last three years, Slim Chickens’ sales grew by 59.8%, reaching $265.05m in revenue. 
  • Not so slim: There are currently more than 190 Slim Chickens' locations around the world, and 1,100 more in the development stage.

Read more about Slim Chickens’ amazing growth HERE.
